name: Stack Words
description:
I'm still new to uploading web game zips to itch. You can also play my game on my personal website, found here: liamchessell.com/stackwords1_0.

### STACK WORDS ###

Stack Words is a falling block puzzle game inspired by the Gameboy and NES title Mario & Yoshi.

In order to earn points you must match the falling blocks by colour or use them to spell out any of the 3 chosen words at the side of the screen. You can do this by pressing A, S or D to swap columns around and DOWN to send blocks falling to the bottom of the screen.

Project created by Liam Chessell for #1GAM May 2015
